INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_ONLINE_FX_REQ (AC_ONLINE_FX_REQ_ID, CMPNY_CDE, CMPNY_IBUSDATE, CMPNY_BUSDATE, FROM_AC_ID, FROM_SEGR_FUND_ID, FROM_CCY_CDE, FROM_AMT, TO_AC_ID, TO_SEGR_FUND_ID, TO_CCY_CDE, TO_AMT, VAL_DATE, EXCH_RATE, CONV_PURP_CDE, APRV_CMPNY_IBUSDATE, APRV_CMPNY_BUSDATE, APRV_TIME, CANCL_CMPNY_IBUSDATE, CANCL_CMPNY_BUSDATE, CANCL_TIME, FX_STAT_CDE, ORDER_KEY, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.acOnlineFxReqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.cmpnyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cmpnyIbusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.cmpnyBusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.fromAcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fromSegrFundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.fromCcyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fromAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.toAcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.toSegrFundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.toCcyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.toAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.valDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.exchRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.convPurpCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.aprvCmpnyIbusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.aprvCmpnyBusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.aprvTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.canclCmpnyIbusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.canclCmpnyBusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.canclTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.fxStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
